metadata.dc:title: Anti-Helicobacter pylori activity of extracts of Psidium guajava and Coptis chinensis
metadata.dc:description: It is described the synergistic properties of a mixture of Psidium guajava L., extract standardized in its content of flavone glycosides and Coptis chinensis Franch, extract standardized in its content of benzophenantridinic alkaloids, for developing a phytodrug for the treatment and prevention of chronic gastritis induced by Helicobacter pylori. The study explores the properties of this combination of extracts by inhibiting in vitro growth of antibiotic-resistant clinical H. pylori strains and preventing adherence of the bacteria to human AGS cell cultures (AU)
